oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Remarks concerning copies of Bushman Paintings, given by Colonel Durnfold to His Excellency Sir Bartle Frere. By /han=kass'o (L VIII.-22. 7969-7972, 7974 and 7975, 7983-7993, 23. 7995-8004). |han=kass'o describes a copy of rock painting No. 9, in which he thinks that the people depicted are 'Kafirs', or black people.
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Notes on rock painting copy no. 9
